apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  name: release-name-fluent-bit
  namespace: default
  labels:
    helm.sh/chart: fluent-bit-0.53.0
    app.kubernetes.io/name: fluent-bit
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 4.0.7
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: fluent-bit
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: fluent-bit
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
      annotations:
        checksum/config: 8171e72b067d5266d7bcddb8052f04bdf9247e9889fb075d90ccd5939a6ae0da
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: release-name-fluent-bit
      containers:
      - name: fluent-bit
        image: cr.fluentbit.io/fluent/fluent-bit:4.0.7
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        command:
        - /fluent-bit/bin/fluent-bit
        args:
        - --workdir=/fluent-bit/etc
        - --config=/fluent-bit/etc/conf/fluent-bit.conf
        ports:
        - name: http
          containerPort: 2020
          protocol: TCP
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: http
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /api/v1/health
            port: http
        volumeMounts:
        - name: config
          mountPath: /fluent-bit/etc/conf
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: varlog
        - mountPath: /var/lib/docker/containers
          name: varlibdockercontainers
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/machine-id
          name: etcmachineid
          readOnly: true
        securityContext:
          runAsNonRoot: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      volumes:
      - name: config
        configMap:
          name: release-name-fluent-bit
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log
        name: varlog
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/docker/containers
        name: varlibdockercontainers
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/machine-id
          type: File
        name: etcmachineid

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: release-name-fluent-bit-test-connection
  namespace: default
  labels:
    helm.sh/chart: fluent-bit-0.53.0
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 4.0.7
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
  annotations:
    helm.sh/hook: test
    helm.sh/hook-delete-policy: hook-succeeded
spec:
  containers:
  - name: wget
    image: busybox:stable
    imagePullPolicy: Always
    command:
    - sh
    args:
    - -c
    - sleep 5s && wget -O- release-name-fluent-bit:2020
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      privileged: false
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
    resources:
      requests:
        cpu: 10m
        memory: 32Mi
      limits:
        cpu: 50m
        memory: 64Mi

          value: gitea_admin
        - name: GITEA_ADMIN_PASSWORD
          value: r8sA8CPHD9!bt6d
        - name: GITEA_ADMIN_PASSWORD_MODE

        - name: SSH_PORT

          defaultMode: 110
      - name: config

          secretName: release-name-gitea
          defaultMode: 110

        secret:
          secretName: release-name-gitea-inline-config

        persistentVolumeClaim:

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: release-name-gitlab-runner
  namespace: default
  labels:
    app: release-name-gitlab-runner
    chart: gitlab-runner-0.81.0
    release: release-name
    heritage: Helm
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: release-name-gitlab-runner
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: release-name-gitlab-runner
        chart: gitlab-runner-0.81.0
        release: release-name
        heritage: Helm
      annotations:
        checksum/configmap: b9a97367f708f909d06f31603187138f92ff2d5db59610719b91b9901db1e075
    spec:
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 65533
        runAsUser: 100
      serviceAccountName: ''
      containers:
      - name: release-name-gitlab-runner
        image: registry.gitlab.com/gitlab-org/gitlab-runner:alpine-v18.4.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
        command:
        - /usr/bin/dumb-init
        - --
        - /bin/bash
        - /configmaps/entrypoint
        env:
        - name: CI_SERVER_URL
          value: null
        - name: RUNNER_EXECUTOR
          value: kubernetes
        - name: REGISTER_LOCKED
          value: 'true'
        - name: RUNNER_TAG_LIST
          value: ''
        - name: SESSION_SERVER_ADDRESS
          value: null
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /bin/bash
            - /configmaps/check-live
            - '3'
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          timeoutSeconds: 4
          periodSeconds: 60
          successThreshold: 1
          failureThreshold: 3
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /usr/bin/pgrep
            - gitlab.*runner
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          timeoutSeconds: 4
          periodSeconds: 60
          successThreshold: 1
          failureThreshold: 3
        ports:
        - name: metrics
          containerPort: 9252
        volumeMounts:
        - name: etc-gitlab-runner
          mountPath: /home/gitlab-runner/.gitlab-runner
        - name: configmaps
          mountPath: /configmaps
        resources: {}
      volumes:
      - name: runner-secrets
        emptyDir:
          medium: Memory
      - name: etc-gitlab-runner
        emptyDir:
          medium: Memory
      - name: configmaps
        configMap:
          name: release-name-gitlab-runner

metadata:

  namespace: default
  labels:

    app.kubernetes.io/name: grafana
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 12.1.1
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: grafana
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        helm.sh/chart: grafana-10.0.0
        app.kubernetes.io/name: grafana
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 12.1.1
      annotations:
        checksum/config: 0e9cbd0ea8e24e32f7dfca5bab17a2ba05652642f0a09a4882833ae88e4cc4a3
        checksum/sc-dashboard-provider-config: e70bf6a851099d385178a76de9757bb0bef8299da6d8443602590e44f05fdf24
        checksum/secret: 76dc78574fdf5e7dc5f7e5c5ba10f46944b189b4f96f822030e16cd4ac0d7f90
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: grafana
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: release-name-grafana
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 472
        runAsGroup: 472
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 472
      containers:
      - name: grafana
        image: docker.io/grafana/grafana:12.1.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
        volumeMounts:
        - name: config
          mountPath: /etc/grafana/grafana.ini
          subPath: grafana.ini
        - name: storage
          mountPath: /var/lib/grafana
        ports:
        - name: grafana
          containerPort: 3000
          protocol: TCP
        - name: gossip-tcp
          containerPort: 9094
          protocol: TCP
        - name: gossip-udp
          containerPort: 9094
          protocol: UDP
        - name: profiling
          containerPort: 6060
          protocol: TCP
        env:
        - name: POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: release-name-grafana
              key: admin-user
        - name: GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: release-name-grafana
              key: admin-password
        - name: GF_PATHS_DATA
          value: /var/lib/grafana/
        - name: GF_PATHS_LOGS
          value: /var/log/grafana
        - name: GF_PATHS_PLUGINS
          value: /var/lib/grafana/plugins
        - name: GF_PATHS_PROVISIONING
          value: /etc/grafana/provisioning
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          httpGet:
            path: /api/health
            port: 3000
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          timeoutSeconds: 30
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /api/health
            port: 3000
      volumes:
      - name: config
        configMap:
          name: release-name-grafana
      - name: storage
        emptyDir: {}

          path: /var/lib/docker/containers
